meanings.definition: President of a college or university.
meanings.sent1: The prexy of the university welcomed the new students.
meanings.sent2: The prexy gave a speech at the graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The prexy decided to join the students in a game of soccer.
meanings.sent4: The prexy's influence over the campus was like a guiding light.
meanings.sent5: The prexy's commitment to education was unwavering.

meanings.sent1: The company's prexy made an important announcement.
meanings.sent2: The prexy of the organization was well-respected.
meanings.sent3: Everyone was surprised when the prexy showed up in casual attire.
meanings.sent4: The prexy's words carried weight in the boardroom.
meanings.sent5: The prexy's vision for the future inspired the team.
